scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json src/common/constants.mustache > src/common/constants.ts  && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:polygon: mustache config/polygon.json src/common/constants.mustache > src/common/constants.ts && mustache config/polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: mustache config/arbitrum.json src/common/constants.mustache > src/common/constants.ts && mustache config/arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml  && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:beets: mustache config/beets.json src/common/constants.mustache > src/common/constants.ts && mustache config/beets.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml  && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:beetsop: mustache config/beets-optimism.json src/common/constants.mustache > src/common/constants.ts && mustache config/beets-optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml  && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ messari/balancer-v2-ethereum
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ messari/balancer-v2-polygon
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ messari/balancer-v2-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:beets: yarn prepare:beets && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ messari/beethoven-x-fantom
scripts.deploy:beetsop: yarn prepare:beetsop && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ messari/beethoven-x-optimism
